info.name: Swift Docs - Dark Theme
info.description: A slightly dark theme, to make the documentation easier on the eyes (and match Mojave's new dark theme).
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.0.2 - 1567861319
Adjusted URL to be swift.org instead of just docs.swift.org
Fixed background color on .info classes (info/warning boxes)

Initial version 0.0.1 - 1567603986
Still in need of additional checks, but at first regard most things work.
